snippet.title: DROSS // DEMO update 0.46 //  Roguelike FPS Horde Shooter //
snippet.description:
DROSS is a first person Co-Op Xeno-Horde Procedural Rogue-like Shooter:
For PC Mac & SteamDeck 

Demo now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2083940/DROSS/

Credit to https://www.FesliyanStudios.com for the background music
